segments.text: This kitchen is a mess, starting with that filthy overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring everywhere, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting ruined too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, pilfering cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's grubby hands in the jarâ€” gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks dirty and unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, probably covered in crumbs soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is spreading, all slimy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how careless this all is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the open cabinets seem inviting trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's nice, but it can't hide the disgust inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, waiting to be dirtied more.
segments.speaker: PAR
